text:
@timothy_stanley Not only is this a contentious piece, @timothy_stanley.

It is also factually inaccurate.

1) Face covering is not about "politeness". This is a lethal virus, and it's about public health.

2) #Coronavirus is not receding. Far from it.

A shameful, irresponsible article. https://t.co/y3SKohZygG

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
